posts.author: eltalstro
posts.content: I'm trying to do a half-orc shaman (druidish or is that druish?) type build but I wish it could be full-orc. That made me think about this one time when my Dwarven, battle-priest toon was trying to figure out smithing at a forge in my PW (this is like 13 years ago). Anyway, he's sweating and swearing away and in walks this ogre looking PC I'm pretty sure it was a PC or perhaps it was controlled by a DM, I don't know, but it had a name and was obviously being controlled. It was at least twice the size of any normal PC toon I've seen. It jogs over to a forge, tinkers around for a minute  (I think I emoted something like *stares in bewildered disbelief*) then plods back out never to be seen again (at least by me). Is this something that you can actually do? Make monster PCs?

posts.author: Maximillian_Kane
posts.content:
Heya!

It was most likely a DM-controlled monster. Last time I had to delete an item on WoG, Wise came in wielding a Mind Flayer LOL.

For PC creation, there'd need to be some scripts set up for different races.
